title: A Nation of shopkeepers
creator_credit: World Wide and British Productivity Council
brief_description: Intelligent use of Method Study can help any trader, shopkeeper, distributor or manufacturer. The example of an ironmonger’s shop shows how analysis of work is applied to the retail trade, leading to lower costs, higher turnovers, less waste of time and money, and greater satisfaction to both staff and customers. How to keep the cost of changes of layout and method involved to a minimum.
